content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":259672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　などなど","translatedEnglishLine":"And so on."},{"lineNumber":259673,"originalJapaneseLine":"スシヌがぼんやりと感じている","translatedEnglishLine":"Sushinu is feeling vaguely."},{"lineNumber":259674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　パセリを呼ぶが現れない、ここはどこだろう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Calling Parsley, but she doesn't appear; I wonder where this place is..."},{"lineNumber":259675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エールはどこ、どこ・・あっ、いた","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is Aile? Where... Ah, there he is."},{"lineNumber":259676,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんな同じように座っている","translatedEnglishLine":"They're all sitting in the same way."},{"lineNumber":259677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259678,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここのイメージはもう少し調整","translatedEnglishLine":"Adjust the image here a little more."},{"lineNumber":259679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無音、または、心臓や血流の音、体内の中っぽく","translatedEnglishLine":"Silence, or sounds like heartbeat and blood flow, like inside the body."},{"lineNumber":259680,"originalJapaneseLine":"　透明な自分、消えゆく自分、痛くも苦しくもない、心も平穏、不安な気持ちにならない","translatedEnglishLine":"A transparent self, a self fading away, no pain or suffering, the mind is peaceful, no anxious feelings."},{"lineNumber":259681,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他の者も近くにするのはぼんやりと分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Vaguely aware that others are also nearby."},{"lineNumber":259682,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仲間達以外にも天使や人やモンスターなども多数がぼんやりといるのも見える","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides comrades, I can also see many angels, humans, and monsters vaguely present."},{"lineNumber":259683,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何かがゆっくり消えて行く、そんな感じ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like something is slowly disappearing..."},{"lineNumber":259684,"originalJapaneseLine":"エールもぼんやりしている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile is also dazed."},{"lineNumber":259685,"originalJapaneseLine":"目の前にダークランスが現れる、起きろ、動け、消滅してしまうぞー","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance appears right before me: Get up, move, or you'll disappear!"},{"lineNumber":259686,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イメージ．戦争映画等で爆発で脳震盪になり、ぼんやり、周囲の音も聞こえない状態","translatedEnglishLine":"Image: Like in a war movie where an explosion causes a concussion, dazed and unable to hear sounds around."},{"lineNumber":259687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　　そこに戦友が現れ、大丈夫かとゆすっといると　再び音が聞こえだすとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Then a comrade appears, shaking you and asking if you're alright, and the sounds gradually return."},{"lineNumber":259688,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　　　　そん感じのシーンのイメージ","translatedEnglishLine":"That kind of scene image."},{"lineNumber":259689,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259690,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスさん、どうして・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance, why...?"},{"lineNumber":259691,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいから、早くここから脱出するぞ、みんなを起こせ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Enough talk, let's get out of here quickly. Wake everyone up."},{"lineNumber":259692,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかみんな起きるが、動けない","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone manages to wake up but can’t move."},{"lineNumber":259693,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスが来たと思われる出口、黒い穴は見えるがそこに近づけない","translatedEnglishLine":"They see the exit where Dark Lance likely came from—a black hole—but cannot get close to it."},{"lineNumber":259694,"originalJapaneseLine":"重力のような風が物が自分達を抑えつけている感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"It feels like a gravity-like wind or force is pressing down on us."},{"lineNumber":259695,"originalJapaneseLine":"動けないよ、ダークランスさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't move, Dark Lance."},{"lineNumber":259696,"originalJapaneseLine":"わかっている、ちょっとまて","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand, wait a moment."},{"lineNumber":259697,"originalJapaneseLine":"（ＣＧ：グラム喪失）","translatedEnglishLine":"(CG: Losing Gram)"},{"lineNumber":259698,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ダークランスはグラムを抜き、それをかざす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance draws Gram and holds it up."},{"lineNumber":259699,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　（メモ　ここまでにダークランスがグラムを使うシーンを見せておく必要有り","translatedEnglishLine":"(Note: Need to show a scene where Dark Lance uses Gram before this.)"},{"lineNumber":259700,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ほぼ完成していた宝剣グラム。巨大でまがまがしい剣。","translatedEnglishLine":"The nearly completed sacred sword Gram. A huge, ominous sword."},{"lineNumber":259701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　エール達にまとわりついていた重力風？がグラムに集められる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The gravity-like wind surrounding Aile and the others gathers into Gram."},{"lineNumber":259702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　う、動ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, I can move."},{"lineNumber":259703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　走れ、その出口へ向かえー","translatedEnglishLine":"Run! Head for that exit!"},{"lineNumber":259704,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　グラムは力を失っていくのか、徐々に小さくなっていく・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Gram seems to be losing power, gradually shrinking..."},{"lineNumber":259705,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：空飛ぶランス城全景","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Full view of the Flying Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":259706,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":259707,"originalJapaneseLine":"かって人類総統であったランスが指揮して対魔軍司令部となった","translatedEnglishLine":"Once the supreme commander of humanity, Lance now directs the Anti-Demon Army Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":259708,"originalJapaneseLine":"空飛ぶランス城、今はパットンが艦長となり世界を巡る独立都市となっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The flying Lance Castle, now under Captain Patton’s command, has become an independent city traveling the world."},{"lineNumber":259709,"originalJapaneseLine":"エール達のその後、会話等で次の内容、どこかの部屋","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterwards with Aile and the others, conversations about the following content, in some room."},{"lineNumber":259710,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの時、ボク達は・・","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, we..."},{"lineNumber":259711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大怪獣クエルプランの中に吸い込まれた","translatedEnglishLine":"Were swallowed into the giant monster Quelpuran."},{"lineNumber":259712,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれはどういう場所か分からないが全てを吸い込む場所だった","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t know what kind of place that was, but it swallowed everything."},{"lineNumber":259713,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボク達以外にも過去にクエルプランに吸い込まれた物は全て居た","translatedEnglishLine":"Everything that had been swallowed by Quelpuran before, besides us, was there."},{"lineNumber":259714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ボク達もそのまま吸い込まれ二度と出れなくなっていたかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"We might have been swallowed and never been able to escape."},{"lineNumber":259715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダークランスさんが助けに来てくれた","translatedEnglishLine":"But Dark Lance came to save us."},{"lineNumber":259716,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":259717,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんながっくりしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone is crushed."},{"lineNumber":259718,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶望的に強い魔王ランス、自分達はそれなりに自信があった・・粉々に砕かれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon King Lance, who is hopelessly powerful—We had some confidence... but it was shattered to pieces."},{"lineNumber":259719,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さらに全員が何らかの力を失っている事が分かった","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, we realized everyone had lost some kind of power."},{"lineNumber":259720,"originalJapaneseLine":"　各自、得意とする必殺技","translatedEnglishLine":"Each one's signature finishing move."},{"lineNumber":259721,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エールは自分は何も失っていなかったので、みんなに言われるまで気がつかなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Aile hadn’t lost anything, so he didn’t notice until everyone told him."},{"lineNumber":259722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（あえて自分は失っていないとかは言いません）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I won’t deliberately say that I haven’t lost anything.)"},{"lineNumber":259723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダークランスが補足","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance adds an explanation."},{"lineNumber":259724,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの中から生きて出れただけでも儲けものと思え、","translatedEnglishLine":"Consider it a blessing that you managed to come out alive from there."},{"lineNumber":259725,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれは全ての力を吸収する存在だ、お前達はそれなりにすごい力を持っていたから","translatedEnglishLine":"That thing absorbs all powers. You all had considerable power, so..."},{"lineNumber":259726,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが先に吸われてしまったが命までは助かったのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That power was absorbed first, but your lives were spared."},{"lineNumber":259727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰かが気がつく、そうか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone realizes, I see..."},{"lineNumber":259728,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの時、ダークランスさんが剣を掲げていたのは","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason Dark Lance held up his sword at that time was..."},{"lineNumber":259729,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あれは、悲しみや憎しみを集めて成長した宝剣グラム、俺がバカだった頃に貯めてしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"That is the sacred sword Gram, grown by gathering sorrow and hatred—something I accumulated when I was a fool."},{"lineNumber":259730,"originalJapaneseLine":"　膨大な力を持ったま、あれの力を吸わせているうちにみんな脱出出来たのだから、役には立ったな","translatedEnglishLine":"With its enormous power, by letting it absorb that energy, everyone managed to escape—so it was useful after all."},{"lineNumber":259731,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Or something like that..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌがぼんやりと感じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu is feeling vaguely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリを呼ぶが現れない、ここはどこだろう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling Parsley, but she doesn't appear; I wonder where this place is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはどこ、どこ・・あっ、いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Aile? Where... Ah, there he is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな同じように座っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're all sitting in the same way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここのイメージはもう少し調整
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Adjust the image here a little more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無音、または、心臓や血流の音、体内の中っぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silence, or sounds like heartbeat and blood flow, like inside the body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 透明な自分、消えゆく自分、痛くも苦しくもない、心も平穏、不安な気持ちにならない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A transparent self, a self fading away, no pain or suffering, the mind is peaceful, no anxious feelings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者も近くにするのはぼんやりと分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vaguely aware that others are also nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間達以外にも天使や人やモンスターなども多数がぼんやりといるのも見える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides comrades, I can also see many angels, humans, and monsters vaguely present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かがゆっくり消えて行く、そんな感じ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like something is slowly disappearing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールもぼんやりしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile is also dazed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前にダークランスが現れる、起きろ、動け、消滅してしまうぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance appears right before me: Get up, move, or you'll disappear!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イメージ．戦争映画等で爆発で脳震盪になり、ぼんやり、周囲の音も聞こえない状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Image: Like in a war movie where an explosion causes a concussion, dazed and unable to hear sounds around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに戦友が現れ、大丈夫かとゆすっといると　再び音が聞こえだすとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then a comrade appears, shaking you and asking if you're alright, and the sounds gradually return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そん感じのシーンのイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of scene image.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスさん、どうして・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance, why...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいから、早くここから脱出するぞ、みんなを起こせ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough talk, let's get out of here quickly. Wake everyone up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかみんな起きるが、動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone manages to wake up but can’t move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが来たと思われる出口、黒い穴は見えるがそこに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They see the exit where Dark Lance likely came from—a black hole—but cannot get close to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重力のような風が物が自分達を抑えつけている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like a gravity-like wind or force is pressing down on us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動けないよ、ダークランスさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't move, Dark Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかっている、ちょっとまて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand, wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：グラム喪失）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Losing Gram)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスはグラムを抜き、それをかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance draws Gram and holds it up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （メモ　ここまでにダークランスがグラムを使うシーンを見せておく必要有り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Note: Need to show a scene where Dark Lance uses Gram before this.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ完成していた宝剣グラム。巨大でまがまがしい剣。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The nearly completed sacred sword Gram. A huge, ominous sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達にまとわりついていた重力風？がグラムに集められる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gravity-like wind surrounding Aile and the others gathers into Gram.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、動ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, I can move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走れ、その出口へ向かえー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Run! Head for that exit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グラムは力を失っていくのか、徐々に小さくなっていく・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gram seems to be losing power, gradually shrinking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：空飛ぶランス城全景
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Full view of the Flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かって人類総統であったランスが指揮して対魔軍司令部となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the supreme commander of humanity, Lance now directs the Anti-Demon Army Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城、今はパットンが艦長となり世界を巡る独立都市となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle, now under Captain Patton’s command, has become an independent city traveling the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達のその後、会話等で次の内容、どこかの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards with Aile and the others, conversations about the following content, in some room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、ボク達は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, we...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大怪獣クエルプランの中に吸い込まれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were swallowed into the giant monster Quelpuran.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはどういう場所か分からないが全てを吸い込む場所だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know what kind of place that was, but it swallowed everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達以外にも過去にクエルプランに吸い込まれた物は全て居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything that had been swallowed by Quelpuran before, besides us, was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達もそのまま吸い込まれ二度と出れなくなっていたかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might have been swallowed and never been able to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスさんが助けに来てくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Dark Lance came to save us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんながっくりしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶望的に強い魔王ランス、自分達はそれなりに自信があった・・粉々に砕かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Lance, who is hopelessly powerful—We had some confidence... but it was shattered to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに全員が何らかの力を失っている事が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, we realized everyone had lost some kind of power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各自、得意とする必殺技
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each one's signature finishing move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは自分は何も失っていなかったので、みんなに言われるまで気がつかなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile hadn’t lost anything, so he didn’t notice until everyone told him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あえて自分は失っていないとかは言いません）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I won’t deliberately say that I haven’t lost anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance adds an explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの中から生きて出れただけでも儲けものと思え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consider it a blessing that you managed to come out alive from there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは全ての力を吸収する存在だ、お前達はそれなりにすごい力を持っていたから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That thing absorbs all powers. You all had considerable power, so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが先に吸われてしまったが命までは助かったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That power was absorbed first, but your lives were spared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが気がつく、そうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone realizes, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、ダークランスさんが剣を掲げていたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason Dark Lance held up his sword at that time was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは、悲しみや憎しみを集めて成長した宝剣グラム、俺がバカだった頃に貯めてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the sacred sword Gram, grown by gathering sorrow and hatred—something I accumulated when I was a fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膨大な力を持ったま、あれの力を吸わせているうちにみんな脱出出来たのだから、役には立ったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With its enormous power, by letting it absorb that energy, everyone managed to escape—so it was useful after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or something like that...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: などなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スシヌがぼんやりと感じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sushinu is feeling vaguely.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パセリを呼ぶが現れない、ここはどこだろう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling Parsley, but she doesn't appear; I wonder where this place is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはどこ、どこ・・あっ、いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where is Aile? Where... Ah, there he is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな同じように座っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're all sitting in the same way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここのイメージはもう少し調整
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Adjust the image here a little more.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無音、または、心臓や血流の音、体内の中っぽく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silence, or sounds like heartbeat and blood flow, like inside the body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 透明な自分、消えゆく自分、痛くも苦しくもない、心も平穏、不安な気持ちにならない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A transparent self, a self fading away, no pain or suffering, the mind is peaceful, no anxious feelings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の者も近くにするのはぼんやりと分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Vaguely aware that others are also nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲間達以外にも天使や人やモンスターなども多数がぼんやりといるのも見える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides comrades, I can also see many angels, humans, and monsters vaguely present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何かがゆっくり消えて行く、そんな感じ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like something is slowly disappearing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールもぼんやりしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile is also dazed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前にダークランスが現れる、起きろ、動け、消滅してしまうぞー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance appears right before me: Get up, move, or you'll disappear!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イメージ．戦争映画等で爆発で脳震盪になり、ぼんやり、周囲の音も聞こえない状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Image: Like in a war movie where an explosion causes a concussion, dazed and unable to hear sounds around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに戦友が現れ、大丈夫かとゆすっといると　再び音が聞こえだすとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then a comrade appears, shaking you and asking if you're alright, and the sounds gradually return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そん感じのシーンのイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of scene image.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスさん、どうして・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance, why...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいから、早くここから脱出するぞ、みんなを起こせ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enough talk, let's get out of here quickly. Wake everyone up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかみんな起きるが、動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone manages to wake up but can’t move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが来たと思われる出口、黒い穴は見えるがそこに近づけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They see the exit where Dark Lance likely came from—a black hole—but cannot get close to it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重力のような風が物が自分達を抑えつけている感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It feels like a gravity-like wind or force is pressing down on us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動けないよ、ダークランスさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't move, Dark Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかっている、ちょっとまて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand, wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：グラム喪失）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Losing Gram)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスはグラムを抜き、それをかざす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance draws Gram and holds it up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （メモ　ここまでにダークランスがグラムを使うシーンを見せておく必要有り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Note: Need to show a scene where Dark Lance uses Gram before this.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ完成していた宝剣グラム。巨大でまがまがしい剣。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The nearly completed sacred sword Gram. A huge, ominous sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達にまとわりついていた重力風？がグラムに集められる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The gravity-like wind surrounding Aile and the others gathers into Gram.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: う、動ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, I can move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走れ、その出口へ向かえー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Run! Head for that exit!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グラムは力を失っていくのか、徐々に小さくなっていく・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gram seems to be losing power, gradually shrinking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：空飛ぶランス城全景
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Full view of the Flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かって人類総統であったランスが指揮して対魔軍司令部となった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once the supreme commander of humanity, Lance now directs the Anti-Demon Army Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城、今はパットンが艦長となり世界を巡る独立都市となっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle, now under Captain Patton’s command, has become an independent city traveling the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール達のその後、会話等で次の内容、どこかの部屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards with Aile and the others, conversations about the following content, in some room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、ボク達は・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, we...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大怪獣クエルプランの中に吸い込まれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Were swallowed into the giant monster Quelpuran.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれはどういう場所か分からないが全てを吸い込む場所だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t know what kind of place that was, but it swallowed everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達以外にも過去にクエルプランに吸い込まれた物は全て居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything that had been swallowed by Quelpuran before, besides us, was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボク達もそのまま吸い込まれ二度と出れなくなっていたかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We might have been swallowed and never been able to escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスさんが助けに来てくれた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But Dark Lance came to save us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんながっくりしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶望的に強い魔王ランス、自分達はそれなりに自信があった・・粉々に砕かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon King Lance, who is hopelessly powerful—We had some confidence... but it was shattered to pieces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに全員が何らかの力を失っている事が分かった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, we realized everyone had lost some kind of power.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各自、得意とする必殺技
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each one's signature finishing move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは自分は何も失っていなかったので、みんなに言われるまで気がつかなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aile hadn’t lost anything, so he didn’t notice until everyone told him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （あえて自分は失っていないとかは言いません）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I won’t deliberately say that I haven’t lost anything.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスが補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance adds an explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの中から生きて出れただけでも儲けものと思え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Consider it a blessing that you managed to come out alive from there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは全ての力を吸収する存在だ、お前達はそれなりにすごい力を持っていたから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That thing absorbs all powers. You all had considerable power, so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが先に吸われてしまったが命までは助かったのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That power was absorbed first, but your lives were spared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが気がつく、そうか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone realizes, I see...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時、ダークランスさんが剣を掲げていたのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason Dark Lance held up his sword at that time was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれは、悲しみや憎しみを集めて成長した宝剣グラム、俺がバカだった頃に貯めてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is the sacred sword Gram, grown by gathering sorrow and hatred—something I accumulated when I was a fool.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膨大な力を持ったま、あれの力を吸わせているうちにみんな脱出出来たのだから、役には立ったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With its enormous power, by letting it absorb that energy, everyone managed to escape—so it was useful after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or something like that...
